title: Alan | Fullstack & UX Developer
header_subtitle: Creator of digital tools, mailing for artists and effective web solutions
about_text: Frontend developer in training (Software Engineering student). I’ve built quotation systems for construction companies, language teaching tools, and chart generators. UX certified by Google. I use Vue 3, PHP, SQL, Bootstrap, and Figma. I worked in another field where I learned the value of commitment and time. I feel ready to contribute and grow, and I’d be very grateful for the opportunity to develop in this industry.
project_1_desc: Email tool with smart replies, audience segmentation, and a clear interface. Perfect for artists.
project_2_desc: Online tool to generate loop animation videos.
project_3_desc: Examples of clean, responsive interfaces with API access and thoughtful user experience.
